description: A voter's vote in a vote event
title: Vote

___weight.description: The weight of the voter's vote

$eref.description: A real person, alive or dead
$eref.title: Person

___additional_name.description: One or more secondary given names

___given_name.description: One or more primary given names

___honorific_prefix.description: One or more honorifics preceding a person's name

___created_at.description: The time at which the resource was created

___links.description: URLs to documents about the person

___honorific_suffix.description: One or more honorifics following a person's name

___image.description: A URL of a head shot

___sources.description: URLs to documents from which the resource is derived

___biography.description: An extended account of a person's life

___updated_at.description: The time at which the resource was last modified

___summary.description: A one-line account of a person's life

___sort_name.description: A name to use in a lexicographically ordered list

___pair.description: The person with whom the voter is paired

___pair_id.description: The ID of the person with whom the voter is paired

$eref.description: An event at which people's votes are recorded
$eref.title: Vote event

___group_results.description: The result of the vote event within groups of voters

___counts.description: The number of votes for options

___created_at.description: The time at which the resource was created

___motion_id.description: The ID of the motion being decided

___end_date.description: The time at which the event ends

___sources.description: URLs to documents from which the resource is derived

___organization.description: The organization whose members are voting

___result.description: The result of the vote event

___legislative_session.description: The legislative session in which the vote occurs

___start_date.description: The time at which the event begins

___organization_id.description: The ID of the organization whose members are voting

___updated_at.description: The time at which the resource was last modified

___legislative_session_id.description: The ID of the legislative session in which the vote occurs

___voter.description: The person or organization that is voting

___voter_id.description: The ID of the person or organization that is voting

___group_id.description: The ID of the voter's primary political group

___role.description: The voter's role in the event

___option.description: The option chosen by the voter, whether actively or passively

$eref.description: A group with a common purpose or reason for existence that goes beyond the set of people belonging to it
$eref.title: Organization

___vote_events.description: Vote events in which members of the organization are voting

___parent_id.description: The ID of the organization that contains this organization

___description.description: An extended description of an organization

___memberships.description: The memberships of the members of the organization and of the organization itself

___area_id.description: The ID of the geographic area to which this organization is related

___links.description: URLs to documents about the organization

___name.description: A primary name, e.g. a legally recognized name

___area.description: The geographic area to which this organization is related

___vote_event_id.description: The ID of a vote event
